title: This Relaxed Everlane Silk Blouse (That’s an Equipment Dupe) Is Just $44
text:
1 item in this article Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

Everlane does a lot of things well, but its women’s silk shirts are beloved. As evidence: “I get compliments and asked ‘Where’s that from?’ every single time I wear one of my silk blouses,” says writer and Everlaneologist Robin Reetz. There’s a bunch of summery silk in Everlane’s Choose What You Pay section right now, but this relaxed silk button-down is especially suited to September’s transitional weather — cool enough to wear something warmer than a T-shirt but still too hot to commit to a sweater. In terms of style, this is a straight-up dupe for the versatile button-downs from Parisian brand Equipment, meaning it’s an easy shirt to throw on and dress up (or down) for any occasion. And right now, it’s just $44, 50 percent off the already-reasonable regular price of $88, making it an even better deal than usual.
